column1: Baby Barnaby's////I've been avoiding going to baby barnabys because my first love was (adult??) barnabys cafe on south shepherd and it didn't make sense for me to abandon that for a baby version. But I finally dragged myself food and was delighted to discover that the food is just as legitimate
column2: rich and heavy but packed full of flavor. I might even go as far as to say the decor is even more quaint than the regular barnabys cafe. However
column3: parking is the only downside so if you're going for the green eggs like I usually do
column5: the regular barnabys offers pretty much the same menu so might as well visit there!
